name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CtrlGPT Web | Safe AI usage for Enterprises

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent data from leaking to AI models with CtrlGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sensitive Data detection and leakage prevention.

Report a bug: bugreport@ctrlgpt.ca
Feature request: support@ctrlgpt.ca

In an era where data breaches are increasingly common, CtrlGPT offers robust protection against unintended data exposure to AI models. Personal data, sensitive information, PII data - you name it, we protect it. Enable your employees to use ChatGPT with confidence, masking any sensitive data to prevent data-leakage. Use AI safely.

********************************************
Simple setup:
- Go to https://ctrlgpt.ca and start onboarding
or contact us to register
- You'll get email with setup confirmation
- Login and add your employees

That's it! Each employee will receive an email with installation link and free license key
********************************************

We keep the service free for 3 months for early adopters, so catch your chance to secure your data for free!

Contact us at info@ctrlgpt.ca if you have questions or suggestions!
